# Data Description

```{r}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
library(gt)
library(DT)

```


```{r}
case_data<-read.csv("data/coronavirus.csv")%>%
  filter(country =="Dominican Republic")%>%
  select("date",
         "country",
         "type",
         "cases")%>%
  separate(col= date,
           into = c("year","month","day")
           , "-")%>%
  group_by(type,
           year,
           month)%>%
  summarise(monthly_cases=sum(cases))%>%
  unite("time", year, month,sep='-')

case_data_wider<-case_data%>%
  pivot_wider(id_cols = time,
              names_from = type,
              values_from = monthly_cases)
```


```{r}

vaccine_data<-read.csv("data/covid19_vaccine.csv")%>%
  filter(country_region =="Dominican Republic")%>%
  separate(col= date,
           into = c("month","day","year")
           , "/")%>%
  select("year",
         "month",
         "day",
         5:7)%>%
  group_by(year,
           month)%>%
  summarise(monthly_doses_admin=sum(doses_admin),
            monthly_people_partially_vaccinated=sum(people_partially_vaccinated),
            monthly_people_fully_vaccinated=sum(people_fully_vaccinated))%>%
  unite("time", year, month,sep='-')


```

```{r}


datatable(case_data_wider, 
          options = list(pageLength = 6),
          caption = 'The Covid19 Case in Dominican Republic',
          filter = 'top',
          colnames = c('Time', 'Confirmed', 'Death', 'Recovered'))
  

```

```{r}

gt(vaccine_data) %>% 
  tab_header(title = "Number of Vaccinated People in Dominican Republic",
             subtitle = "Data collected monthly from February to August 2021") %>% 
  tab_source_note(md("Source: https://github.com/RamiKrispin/coronavirus")) %>% 
  cols_label(
    time = html("Month"),
    monthly_doses_admin = html("Doses_admin"),
    monthly_people_partially_vaccinated = html("Partially_vaccinated"),
    monthly_people_fully_vaccinated = html("Fully_vaccinated")
  )

```
